title: Poster, El Mono Azul/ Hoja semanal/ Los Traidores/ de la Alianza de Intelectuales antifascistas (The Blue Monkey Weekly Newsletter of the Alliance of Intellectuals against fascism), 1936–37
title_raw: El Mono Azul/ Hoja semanal/ Los Traidores/ de la Alianza de Intelectuales antifascistas (The Blue Monkey Weekly Newsletter of the Alliance of Intellectuals against fascism)
signed: Signed across bottom on stone: La Alianza de Intelectuales Antifascistas
description: Spanish Civil War poster. Brown-skinned man dressed in blue clutches a rifle and raises his left fist in defiance. His figure is superimposed over a photo montage of newsprint, armed soldiers at left and rural workers and a hand putting a coin into a cup initialed with SRI at right. Soldiers with canon and rifles at bottom. Title across top, price (10 cts) of sheet at right.

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, El Mono Azul/ Hoja semanal/ Los Traidores/ de la Alianza de Intelectuales antifascistas (The Blue Monkey Weekly Newsletter of the Alliance of Intellectuals against fascism), 1936–37. lithograph on wove paper. Gift of William P. Mangold. 1997-21-16.
